title: What are the benefits of being jobless? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should feel thankful that you have an opportunity being jobless (if that’s the case). It's time to come out of robotic mechanical routine and do something different and new. It's time to reboot your memory and thinking process and start afresh. Plan your day in a way that you would be spending a limited amount only And try to accommodate your needs within that amount. You would learn that it is possible to live with bare minimum necessities too. Take a break. Being Jobless gives you an opportunity to travel places but try to voyage with minimum possible expenditures. Believe me it's possible!! Relationships are always ignored or taken for granted when one thinks of success, career and earning money. It's your time to value meaningful relationships in your life and see the kind of rewards that you get by nurturing them. I know earnings anyways are required to sustain livelihood. Start looking for earning money with your hobbies. The things that you once thought of but could never do, it's time to do all that now. Explore current trends of earning money instead of traditional ways of doing a job and picking up a salary. At last, remember, jobs are meant for earnings and gaining work satisfaction in life. Both can be achieved without job too. It all depends how you perceive. Good luck!!

You’ll have enough time to get relaxYou’ll know the Real Value of Life and who are your real friends, family and about whom you need to care aboutYou’ll understand yourself and makes you strong enough to face challenges and hurdles during the professional and personal career.I strongly feel that experience as an Unemployee is the best experience that enables you to build successful career and to leave proud and to maintain prideIf you are not attaining these benefits means u didn’t have the real experience of “being jobless”

You won’t be living a mechanical life that most of us are living just for the sake of earning money and having a reputation in the society. You have the freedom to do whatever you want. Make the most of it, be happy and that's what matters in your life. Unless you are happy from within, no amount of money or commodities can make you happy.

You realize importance of money, busy time etc. It is said that, “ Everything is easy, if you are busy”. “ Empty mind is devil’s workshop”. But, if you are emotionally strong and do not bother about society, you can develop your hobbies, meditate, spend time in reading books, watching favorite movies and above of all concentrate on your wealth> Also, you can learn to earn from home by investing in shares, mutual funds etc.
